title: Where the kynges hyghnes is enfourmed, that dyuers and sondrye wrytynges and bokes ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
notes: Imprint from STC; imprint as filmed too dark to read.
Very dark as filmed, affecting readability of text and imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
